about_the_game:
The demo version is limited in the following ways:
Contains only the first 5 stages of chapter 1.
Campaign Mode only (no multiplayer or endless mode)
Full game may be unlocked with purchase of game.

Jump, swing, and swat your way through the alien invasion!

Space Block Buster is a ‘Breakout’ inspired game that takes inspiration from the arcade games of the past and creates a new excitement-filled VR experience. Compete for the high score on each level by unlocking new buffs and items to defeat the alien invasion. But watch out! Some of these aliens fight back!


With a racket in each hand, swing and hit balls to defeat the aliens that are invading each planet. Destroy everything blocking your path to make it to the stage’s final boss, guarding its territory by using space powers.

Get your friends & family hooked on VR!

  • Intuitive gameplay that allows even the newest VR users to enjoy themselves from the very start.
  • Simple, yet addicting and challenging once you get to higher stages.
  • Excellent for small spaces thanks to the racket extension function.

Features

  • Single-player mode: 40 stages & 4 boss stages with their own unique themes and skills




  • Multiverse mode: PVP mode that allows you to compete against other players




  • Challenge modes to get unlimited points




  • Various items, buffs, rackets, and balls allowing for diverse gameplay





  • Unlock item skins through achievements



  • Global leaderboards
  • Natively supports Oculus Rift and Windows Mixed Reality HMD without the need of SteamVR
  • Supports mixed reality capture with LIV
  • Supports bHaptics Tactosy


Space Block Buster is a VR game that lets you enjoy the invigorating thrill of smashing balls and defeating ball-shaped aliens in the most creative ways.

Put your headset on, get your rackets ready, and prepare to begin a wild journey through outer space!

  • OS *: WIndows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Re-experience the feel of a classic arcade game, but this time in VR! Use buffs, power-ups, and different rackets to clear the stages faster than your friends. Work your way up the global leaderboard until you’re number 1 in the galaxy!
